Articles.Content:
I noticed a lot of improvements in the cockpit interior in KSP2, even though part of the cockpit interior was not made, they used a gold material as a shield.

A more refined cockpit means a greater GPU consumption.

In some cases, we don't really care about the picture in the cockpit, especially on some low-spec computers.

At this time, we can choose to turn off the visor to reduce excessive computational consumption.
